text_block_list.text: While having lunch in the cafeteria, I spotted Mejiro Mcqueen.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: … This isn't quite enough…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: … No, I can't give in! I have to limit my diet to the meal plan I decided on…!
She's still struggling with her dietary restriction it seems. I wish I could help her somehow, but―

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: That girl… she's still doing the whole restriction thing! Being able to resist all those irresistibly sugary treats right in front of her, I'm truly amazed by her display of willpower～
choice_data_list: Does McQueen have a sweet tooth?
Does McQueen have a sweet tooth?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Ah, you heard me? Well, guess you can, since we're so close.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Look here, mate. When you think of freedom and equality, you think of me, Goldship! It's the same idea as when you think of sweets, you think of Mcqueen.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: But y'know, all I'm seeing is someone holding back constantly every day. Since the Selection Race, she ain't been eating much, 'ey?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: …… Oops, gotta go. Time to go save the 13th planet. Well then, bye bye～
… I may have received some valuable information.
After returning to my room that day, I spent some time researching meal menus…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Oh? You are… You came to visit again, I see.
choice_data_list: Can I ask you to look at this?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Hm? Look at your notes?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I understand. I will take a look at it.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: This menu plan has so many different options that will help reduce fat… did you research all of this, Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: And especially, this thing… it's sweets, isn't it?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: There are sweets included in this meal plan…?! W-would it be okay for me to eat some?!
choice_data_list:
That will give you more energy 
and let you run with all your might.

That will give you more energy 
and let you run with all your might.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Trainer…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: … Thank you so much. Even though you're not officially my trainer yet, you would go out of your way to do this much.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Would it be okay if I borrow this menu plan for a while?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: And then after that… yes. Would you consider coming to oversee my training again in a week?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: All right, let us meet up again at that time.
Then, after a week passed and I headed to the course―

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: It has been a week, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Now, I will begin my training. Please watch over me…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: ― Hmph!!
And so, I observed Mejiro Mcqueen's training for a while.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ha, ha, ha, ha…!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Haha, my body… it feels so light…!
Mejiro Mcqueen's running had improved beyond recognition…!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: … Phew!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Trainer, what did you think of that?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Uhuhu, I am honored!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: The reason I was able to muster this much strength… is all thanks to your meal plan.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: When it came to dietary restrictions, I had a tendency to be fixated on the idea of fasting―

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Your menu plan was designed with a good understanding of the characteristics of the food, careful calculation of calories, and structured in a way that encourages one to eat.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Thanks to that, I can even have sweets… Haha, I still have plenty of energy left to run!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: … Anyhow, I hope you have come to recognize my true running ability.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Thank you very much. ― Now then, allow me to reintroduce myself.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I am a horsegirl of the proud Mejiro bloodline. My name carries the weight of responsibility, demanding that I achieve victory with elegance, grace, and perfection.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: If you take charge of me, that you must realize that you will also be assuming the role of a trainer for the Mejiro family.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: What do you think? Do you possess that determination?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Haha… that's a reassuring response!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Thank you very much. Now then, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: From here on, I humbly ask for your continued guidance and encouragement. I look forward to working with you.
― That was how my days with Mejiro Mcqueen began!
